snippet.title: StarLight Terminus GamePlay Trailer
snippet.description:
Game Play Trailer for StarLight Terminus.  A single player game created by Chris Johnson on ExoCarbonSoft available on Indie Game Pages released 2018.  This game was created using Blender3d and unity3d. Using a gamepad this game allows for 5 degrees of freedom during gameplay. For more information visit www.exocarbonsoft.com. Thank You.

https://exocarbonsoft.com/

Music is from Envato Market:
Licensor's Author Username: FxBand
Licensee: Chris Johnson
Item Title: Uplifting Synthwave
Item URL: https://audiojungle.net/item/uplifting-synthwave/22407843
Item ID: 22407843


#madewithunity #shmup #indiegame
